snippet: Alan Chambers, president of Exodus International, declared that there was no cure for homosexuality and that “reparative therapy” offered false hopes to gays and could even be harmful.
abstract: Alan Chambers, the president of Exodus International, has declared that there is no cure for homosexuality and that the therapy the organization has championed offered false hopes to gays and could even be harmful; Chambers's statements have led to charges of heresy and a growing schism within the network.
lead_paragraph: Alan Chambers, president of Exodus International, declared that there was no cure for homosexuality and that “reparative therapy” offered false hopes to gays and could even be harmful.

headline.main: Rift Forms in Movement as Belief in Gay ‘Cure’ Is Renounced
headline.print_headline: Rift Forms in Movement as Belief in Gay ‘Cure’ Is Renounced
